title: Lover
description:
Is this the best Taylor Swift song of all time? Some people seem to think so, and Taylor herself speaks out about it! When exactly was this song written? What were her intentions for this song? And what is the controversial line that she has had to defend ever since?
Amy, Nick, Lacey and Ana discuss and dissect this beautiful song!
What did we miss? What would you like to hear? Let us know!
